## Public Member Functions

### convertToErrorCode() {#a11bf2cd627f113d68a3fdc27efe062d0}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::error&#95;code llvm::json::ParseError::convertToErrorCode () const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Convert this error to a std::error&#95;code.

This is a temporary crutch to enable interaction with code still using std::error&#95;code. It will be removed in the future.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/json-h/#l00906">906</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/json-h">JSON.h</a>.
